docs.snippet: Kmart and Dairy Queen join nearly a dozen merchants that have had their in-store payment systems compromised with malware over the last year....

headline.main: Kmart and Dairy Queen Report Data Breach

docs.abstract: Kmart and Dairy Queen join nearly a dozen merchants that have had their in-store payment systems compromised with malware over the last year.

docs.snippet: Actress Misty Upham, who played a housekeeper in the movie adaption of "August: Osage County," has been missing in Washington state for six days, police said on Friday....

headline.main: Actress Misty Upham Reported Missing in Washington State: Police
headline.print_headline: Actress Misty Upham Reported Missing in Washington State: Police

docs.lead_paragraph: Actress Misty Upham, who played a housekeeper in the movie adaption of "August: Osage County," has been missing in Washington state for six days, police said on Friday.

docs.snippet: Authorities say a man accused of being behind one of the world's biggest money-laundering businesses has been extradited from Spain to the U.S. to face charges....

headline.main: US Officials: Liberty Reserve Founder Extradited
headline.print_headline: US Officials: Liberty Reserve Founder Extradited

docs.lead_paragraph: Authorities say a man accused of being behind one of the world's biggest money-laundering businesses has been extradited from Spain to the U.S. to face charges.

docs.snippet: A county clerk in Idaho began issuing marriage licenses to same-sex couples on Friday after the U.S. Supreme Court lifted a stay on an appeals court ruling that overturned a ban on gay matrimony in the state....

headline.main: Idaho Clerk Begins Issuing Marriage Licenses to Same-Sex Couples
headline.print_headline: Idaho Clerk Begins Issuing Marriage Licenses to Same-Sex Couples

docs.lead_paragraph: A county clerk in Idaho began issuing marriage licenses to same-sex couples on Friday after the U.S. Supreme Court lifted a stay on an appeals court ruling that overturned a ban on gay matrimony in the state.

docs.snippet: A former guard was found guilty of taking bribes from a Hawaii prison gang to smuggle drugs and cigarettes to prisoners, while an inmate was convicted of leading a brutal attack to maintain his position in the gang....

headline.main: Ex-Guard, Inmate Convicted in Hawaii Gang Trial
headline.print_headline: Ex-Guard, Inmate Convicted in Hawaii Gang Trial

docs.lead_paragraph: A former guard was found guilty of taking bribes from a Hawaii prison gang to smuggle drugs and cigarettes to prisoners, while an inmate was convicted of leading a brutal attack to maintain his position in the gang.

docs.snippet: A 59-year-old California woman who spent 17 years in prison for murder was ordered freed on Friday by a judge who said she was wrongly convicted on the basis of testimony by a woman known to be a habitual liar, the Los Angeles Times reported on Fr...

headline.main: California Woman Freed After 17 Years, Declared Innocent of Murder
headline.print_headline: California Woman Freed After 17 Years, Declared Innocent of Murder

docs.lead_paragraph: A 59-year-old California woman who spent 17 years in prison for murder was ordered freed on Friday by a judge who said she was wrongly convicted on the basis of testimony by a woman known to be a habitual liar, the Los Angeles Times reported on Friday.

headline.print_headline: Indiana Man Grows Giant Pumpkins in His Backyard

docs.snippet: Overjoyed residents of Malala Yousafzai's home town in Swat, Pakistan, celebrate her becoming the youngest ever Nobel Peace Prize winner. Jennifer Davis reports....

headline.main: Malala's home town celebrates Nobel win
headline.sub: Malala's home town celebrates Nobel win

docs.lead_paragraph: Overjoyed residents of Malala Yousafzai's home town in Swat, Pakistan, celebrate her becoming the youngest ever Nobel Peace Prize winner. Jennifer Davis reports.
